Title: Peller defends ₦500,000 job interview, says two candidates selected
Summary: TikTok personality and content creator, Habeeb Hamzat Adelaja, popularly known as Peller, has said that two candidates have been selected from his recent cameraman job screening and would be paid a monthly salary of ₦500,000 .

Title: INEC sets August for nationwide voter Registration
Summary: INEC has announced the commencement of the nationwide Continuous Voter Registration (CVR) exercise ahead of the 2027 general elections . Both online and in-person phases set to begin in August .

Title: In Pictures: Emir Sanusi meets England coach, Thomas Tuchel
Summary: Emir of Kano, Muhammad Sanusi II, met former Chelsea and England coach, Thomas Tuchel . Details of the meeting were not made public, but the meeting drew widespread attention on social media .

Title: Jobseeker alleges exploitation after Peller used recruitment process for content
Summary: A Nigerian content creator, Nkese Eyo, has claimed she was used for content during a job interview session organised by TikTok personality Habeeb Hamzat Adelaja, popularly known as Peller . The incident happened earlier in the week after Peller posted a photo of himself on TikTok .

Title: SERAP sues NNPCL over alleged misuse of ₦825b, $2.5b for refinery repairs
Summary: SERAP sues NNPCL over alleged misuse of ₦825b, $2.5b for refinery repairs . The Socio-Economic Rights and Accountability Project (SERAP) has filed a lawsuit against the Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation Limited .

Title: Preview: PSG, Chelsea set for Club World Cup final showdown
Summary: Paris Saint-Germain face Chelsea in the first edition of FIFA's expanded Club World Cup . Donald Trump among those set to be in attendance at the MetLife Stadium in New York .

Title: Police arrest 14 suspects, bust armed robbery gang in Kaduna
Summary: The Kaduna State Police Command has intensified its crackdown on criminal activities across the state . The coordinated operations also led to the recovery of eight locally-made guns, 16 cartridges, three stolen vehicles, and one motorcycle .

Title: Serving food not my campaign strategy – Peter Obi clarifies
Summary: Former Anambra State Governor and Labour Party presidential candidate in the 2023 general elections, Mr. Peter Obi, has clarified that his appearance at a charity event where he was seen serving food to the less privileged was not a political campaign stunt .

Title: Soyinka, an inspiration to the world, Tinubu lauds Nobel laureate at 91
Summary: President Bola Tinubu has celebrated Nobel Laureate, Professor Wole Soyinka, on his 91st birthday . The tribute was contained in a statement issued on Sunday by the Special Adviser to the President on Information and Strategy, Bayo Onanuga .

Title: Dickson faults Natasha’s suspension, calls for her recall
